A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible...badly miss timed humor\, plot holes you could drive a truck through\, Rey's terrible character development\, Lukes character has been completely butchered - doesn't seem to care that his good fri nd Han is dead\, force ghosts now able to control lightning\, Snokes interesting character wasted with no back story\, etc etc etc....I could go on.\nA huge mess of a film can't see how they can come back from this for the next movie.  Very disappointing.
